entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence What how holding Trump responsible for what he didn't do and did.

Failing to act when he was warned about the Coronavirus in January, calling it a democratic hoax, telling people to ingest disinfectants, and use an unproven pharmaceutical drug to treat the disease.🤨🤬
